game.name: Football Survivors
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: THE FOOTBALL WAR HAS STARTED! Thousands of raging fans are storming the field. Defend against the fan invasion! 30+ unique heroes and abilities, 50+ upgrade items, position your heroes strategically, crush the waves of fans!
game.shortDescriptionEn: THE FOOTBALL WAR HAS STARTED! Thousands of raging fans are storming the field. Defend against the fan invasion! 30+ unique heroes and abilities, 50+ upgrade items, position your heroes strategically, crush the waves of fans!
